author: Lon.TV
description:
Buy one on Amazon: https://lon.tv/e4bdr (compensated affiliate link) - Sandisk's new Creator Phone SSD has a magnet mount compatible with Apple MagSafe and comes with a five year warranty. It lacks power passthrough and also has some annoying app nagging but it is able to reliably record 4k 60fps prores footage. See more production : https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIvvVOzAg3BFV34vVmIhs8OJ and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s
